slideInfo.title: Which rhetorical mode is the author of this passage using?

pButton.Name: Process Analysis
pButton.popInfo: This is not correct. The author does not explain a process or show how something is done.

pButton.Name: Description
pButton.popInfo: You are correct. The author uses the rhetorical mode of description in this passage.

pButton.Name: Classification
pButton.popInfo: This is not correct. The author does not put items into categories or classify them in any way.
